Learn to write concise code with the tips Zergs learned over the years.

The Computer Nonsense Guide is a collection of bite-sized tips and tricks
that cover among other topics, the following:

  • Concurrency
  • Debugging
  • GC
  • Pattern matching
  • Performance
  • Protoss quirks
